item.title: NPC's telling when someone is online help
item.dc:creator: @runegay runegay
item.description:
@runegay wrote:

so then i get Last login: Mon Dec 10 21:27:22 on ttyp1 Welcome to Darwin! cody-melthratters-computer:~ codymelthratter$ /Users/codymelthratter/Desktop/Runegay/runserver.bat; exit NPCHandler.java:434: cannot find symbol symbol : variable npcID location: class NPCHandler if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("runegay") && npcID == 1203) ^ NPCHandler.java:450: cannot find symbol symbol : variable npcID location: class NPCHandler if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("stroodle") && npcID == 1200) ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 2 errors Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use? config\objects.cfg: file not found. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 11, 2007, 06:23:42 PM[/size][hr]someone help please

Read full topic

item.title: NPC's telling when someone is online help
item.dc:creator: @snowycards snowycards
item.description:
@snowycards wrote:

you need to define which npc is saying that if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("runegay") && npcID == 241) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "runegay is Online"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "runegay is Offline"; }

Read full topic

item.description:

i have this:

anything wrong???
